title: Data-Driven Gymnastics Lesson Project Design: Strengthening Managerial Leadership Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: A language education domain project through gymnastics class activities, aiming to develop organizational leadership and enhance stress management competencies

learning_goals: Learners evaluate the correlation between educational objectives and content with 80% accuracy using data analysis tools (e.g., surveys) when designing gymnastics class projects
When designing gymnastics programs for diverse age groups, propose at least three customized content options reflecting statistical characteristics.
Apply effectiveness verification methods from summative evaluations to develop an educational improvement strategy report for gymnastics classes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
